Instructions:

Qardan Hasana  - This is where financial assistance is provided for a limited period of time; typically 12 months duration / 1 installemnt per month... first installment starting after 45 days... Gold is kept as a Rehan (collateral) which is typically 75% of the amount required. So if 10 lakh (Indian Rupees) is required by indivisual he will have to keep Gold as rehan of atleast amount Rs: 7.5 lakh. (10L is 10 lakh in short)

Procedure to get Qardan Hasana - User needs to come to Qardan Office and get a clearance letter. Get it signed from Finance, Jamaat Secratory and Amil Saheb. Once done... visit https://qardanhasana.org website and fill Qardan Hasana form. Before filling Qardan Hasana form you will have to complete your profiles; personal profile, work profile and bank details. Profile has to be approved by Qardan Committee member. Hence message any Qardan member after completing the profiles. Once profile is approved you can apply for Qardan online.

Time taken for Qardan hasana disbursement - Once your application is fully submitted on the Qardan portal with relevant documents, it takes about 2 weeks to process the application and the amount to come to your bank account considering you have correctly filled the form and provided relevant documents

Documents required for Qardan - You will need a PAN card, Aadhar card, cancelled Cheque photo, ITR return for 2 years, Bank statement for last 6 months, if you are starting a business - you will need a business plan, if you need for medical, education or other - you need to provide it's relevant documents to be able to prove the requirement.

Additional Requirements:  -l need 2 guarantors if your Qardan amount is less than 15 lakh and 4 guarantor if it's more. At the time of applying Qardan application you will need guarantor's ITS ids
